@import "Variables";
@import "mixins/mediaQuery";
 
.CoveoSearchInterface.coveo-small-recommendation {
 
  .coveo-recommendation-dropdown-header {
    @include order(1);
    @include defaultRoundedBorder();
    background-color: white;
 
    &.coveo-dropdown-header-active {
      background-color: $color-blueish-white-grey;
      border-color: $color-vibrant-blue;
    }
  }
 
  .coveo-recommendation-dropdown-content {
    @include transition(all $standard-transition-timing-function 300ms);
    overflow: hidden;
    max-height: 0;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 25px 0 15px;
    border-bottom: 0px solid $color-blueish-white-grey;
 
    @include smallMobile() {
      @include transition(all $standard-transition-timing-function 400ms);
    }
    
    &.coveo-recommendation-column, &.CoveoRecommendation {
      display: block;
    }
    
    &.coveo-open-dropdown-content {
      max-height: 1000px;
      width: 100%;
      border-bottom: 5px solid $color-blueish-white-grey;
    }
  }

    padding: 0;
  }
 
  .CoveoRecommendation {
    border: none;
  }

      border-top: $default-border;
    }
  }

    border-bottom: $default-border;
  }

    color: $color-blueish-gray;
  }
}
